sn51.32:1.3: katamesam dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagato evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo”ti?
sn51.32:2.2: “catunnam kho, bhikkhave, iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagato evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo.
sn51.32:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tathagato chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti—
sn51.32:3.3: iti me chando na ca atilino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.32:3.5: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.32:3.6: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.32:3.7: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.32:3.8: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.32:3.12: iti me vimamsa na ca atilina bhavissati, na ca atipaggahita bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitta bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitta bhavissati.
sn51.32:3.14: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.32:3.15: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.32:3.16: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.32:3.17: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.32:3.18: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagato evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo.
sn51.32:4.1: Imesanca pana, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagato anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
sn51.32:4.2: Imesanca pana, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagato asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
